article_title: Obamacare Makes Health Coverage Less Affordable For Entrepreneurs

article_metadata.description: By BRADBURY H. ANDERSON — President Barack Obama's pledge that doctors and health plans would not change under the Affordable Care Act has proven illusory, and nobody knows that better than America's entrepreneurs. Due to a glitch in the law, they're left with much more expensive, second-rate health insurance. Just ask "David" in North Carolina, one of many entrepreneurs who 2013 suddenly had no health insurance at all.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
